metadata.dcterms:title: Alice Williams: 4 old stories told in Lushootseed and in English
metadata.dcterms:creator: Williams, Alice
Hilbert, Vi
metadata.dcterms:description:
-COPY/ Alice Williams tells 4 old stories in Lushootseed and English: "Grizzly Bear, Raven and Coyote", "Raven and the Berries", "Sea Shells", fourth unknown.

-Taped by Vi Hilbert at Upper Skagit, Alice Born June 16, 1907, 45 min.

-From 2007-101-T-6
